com.foretees.client.attribute
Class SelectionList

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.foretees.client.attribute.SelectionList
public class SelectionList
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds information to construct a html select component

Constructor Detail

SelectionList

public SelectionList(java.lang.String theName,
                     java.lang.String theLabel)
This constructor initializes the name and label for the selection list.

SelectionList

public SelectionList(java.lang.String theName,
                     java.lang.String theLabel,
                     java.lang.String[] content,
                     java.lang.String selected)
This constructor initializes the name and label for the selection list as well as creates options for each element in the String array passed in. The display name and display value will be identical. This will also set the element that matches the selected string as the selected option.

Method Detail

setLabel

public void setLabel(java.lang.String theLabel)
Sets the text to use as the label for this selection list when displayed in the user interface.

Parameters:
theLabel - the string text to use as the label.

getLabel

public java.lang.String getLabel()
Returns the text to be used as the label for this selection list when displayed in the user interface.

Returns:
the text to use as the label.

addOption

public void addOption(java.lang.String displayName,
                      java.lang.String displayValue,
                      boolean isSelected)
Adds a option to the selection list.

Parameters:
displayName - the text to show for this option
displayValue - the id to use for this option

getOption

public com.foretees.client.attribute.Option getOption(int theIndex)
Returns the month to be used when displaying this selection list in the user interface.

Returns:
the month to show as selected.

setToolTip

public void setToolTip(java.lang.String theToolTip)
Sets the text to use as the tooltip for this selection list when displayed in the user interface.

Parameters:
theToolTip - the text to use for this selection list.

getToolTip

public java.lang.String getToolTip()
Returns the string to be used as the tooltip for this selection list when displayed in the user interface.

Returns:
the tooltip to use for this selection list.

setName

public void setName(java.lang.String theName)
Sets the name to use to identify this selection list. This name should be unique for all selection lists that will be shown in the same page. This name will be used for the component rendered in the html form.

Parameters:
theName - the name to use to identify this selection list.

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name that identifies this selection list.

Returns:
the url to use for this action.
